mapper.select: SELECT L.LOG_NO logNo, U.USER_ID logUserId, U.USER_NAME logUserName, L.LOG_VALUE logValue, L.LOG_DATE logDate FROM TB_LOG L JOIN TB_USER U ON (L.LOG_USER_ID = U.USER_ID) ORDER BY L.LOG_DATE, L.LOG_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LOG ( LOG_NO, LOG_USER_ID, LOG_USER_NAME, LOG_VALUE, LOG_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_LOG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{logUserId}, #{logUserName}, #{logValue}, SYSDATE )
